headline: Colgate-Palmolive’s 2030 Plan Tests Growth, Productivity And Valuation Optimism
summary: Colgate-Palmolive (NYSE:CL) has launched a new 2030 Strategic Growth and Productivity Program. The company set out a refreshed corporate strategy centered on innovation, digital capabilities, omnichannel demand generation, and organizational restructuring. The program follows recent resilient results for its core operations, alongside ongoing challenges in its skin health business. For you as an investor, this move is tied to Colgate-Palmolive's role as a global consumer products company...
